name: Lianhai Casino
description:
Stories
Four of the most popular figures in Lianhai City are trapped on top of a mysterious cruise ship at the same time!
The ship is actually the famous casino "Lian Hai Casino" which is disguised as a cruise ship.
It wanders the high seas and becomes a lawless trifle!
Gameplay
Players will choose one of four characters to play.
The hero is trapped on a cruise ship that is engaged in illegal gambling
In the game, players need to participate in the gambling games, communicate with the people on board, use their wisdom to escape the cruise ship, and discover the secrets of the cruise ship




Features
  • Multi-series game characters debut
  • Nostalgic-style graphics and music
  • Abundant characters and mini-games
Overwhelming! Unprecedented! Super diverse characters！
If you win their hearts,
Then you can acquire a variety of skills!
Take a bigger advantage in casino games！
